comment.body: @Thoughtcrime: Nice.  Can you post the link?

It's sad that ISIS exists in the first place.  Moreover, I don't think it qualifies as news that some Jihadi fuckheads are using ZeroNet.  I guess it's just terrible bad luck that with our tiny bit of press exposure, we are already connected to terrorism.  @rw: Can ZeroNet be brought down by a country blocking some kind of port?
